tile_content: Second Installation for Beats, Rhymes, and Tech (Hip Hop Interactives): Turn my environment into an interactive graffiti that anyone can be involved in.
content_details: I created an interactive environment that was inspired by graffiti and gentrification. I wanted to show how neighborhoods and enviornments change through an interactive graffiti environment. I used a webcam and image processing to alter the webcam image so the more it moves, then the more you see an image.

tile_content: Second Installation for Beats, Rhymes, and Tech (Hip Hop Interactives): Second Part of Tangible Graffiti which “capture bubbles” of each frame of the webcam.
content_details: Second Part of Tangible Graffiti which “capture bubbles” of each frame of the webcam. The Bubbles are dependent on movement so the more you move the bigger the bubbles and it capture the colors of the frame. I feel like this captures the larger than life aspect of graffiti and it makes the view feel that the piece is coming alive.

tile_content: Experimenting with different materials, I used cloth to develop this rope installation.
content_details: The installation was due to another approach with experimentation with a different material. I was interested in experimenting with fabric, so I considered hair braiding due to my interest in braids, especially hair braiding. I tore fabric and created different sizes of braids and I decided it will be interesting to tie them in knots that resemble sea coral or fungi. I used shear fabric and I started to hang it, knot it, and manipulate it until I got this shape. I was working at the LED at the time and I incorporated it in this installation.

tile_content: Interactive prototype for a health exhibit for Konya Science Center
content_details: I sketched and developed an interactive prototype for one of the interactive exhibit used for the Konya Science Center in Turkey. In order for patrons to learn about diet and health, the interactive allows the user to play a game where people can match two cards of the same food image and increase their energy

tile_content: Third Installation for Beats, Rhymes, and Tech (Hip Hop Interactives):
content_details: E-Motion Movement is the third installation in a series of interactive installation inspired by hip hop culture. This installation is a digital representation of Breaking/B-boying, and my intentions to use movement/dance to be visually represented and expressed.
content_tool: Microsoft Kinect, Kinect Libraries in Processing

tile_content: Integrating digital and physical work, I built a physical and digital work that allows for triangles on triangles.
content_details: Inspired by Digital Growth, I wanted to create an installation that allowed for an interactive projection on 3D objects so I created Triangle Reconstruction. It is an installation that integrates both physical and digital objects (representations of triangles) to allow for an engaging interactive experience.

tile_content: Generative art piece that is controlled by the click of the mouse.
content_details: I created a generative art piece that is controlled by the click of the mouse. The premise of this piece was to use particles to show a sense of growth. The digital growth is developed with a Particle class, which randomly decides the length, direction, and twist of the particles in order to create a 3D affect. I wanted to use the mouse to display and show increasing growth.

project_name: Map: Find Out What New Viruses are Emerging In Your Backyard
tile_content: Showcase the rise of pandemics throughout the world.
content_details: NPR Visuals and Goats and Sodas team up to showcase the rise of pandemics throughout the world. I sketched the map graphic which showcase the location of the pandemics and developed this graphic the rise of pandemics in each continent.

project_name: Most Mass Shootings Are Smaller, Domestic Tragedies
tile_content: Showcasing data on mass shooting.
content_details: Data Visualization using D3.js showcasing the opportunity to explore and dissect mass shootings such as the the definition of mass shootings, location, and the demographic of the shooters.

project_name: English Language Learners: How Your State Is Doing
tile_content: Presenting data on English Language Learners (ELL)
content_details: 1 out of 10 public school students in the United States right now is learning to speak English, and are taking “English Language Learners” (ELL) classes. NPR Visuals and NPRED showcased who are “English Language Learners”, how they are being taught, and where they have the most supportive communities. I developed three graphics that showcased more of ELLs.

tile_content: Map: showcasing attractions, booths, and utilities at Boston Calling Musical Festival 2018
content_details: Using Leaflet.js, I created a map of the location of the music festival, Boston Calling, and showing where attractions, utilities, and booths will be located this year. Furthermore, my goal for this project is to visualize how this festival has made improvements for its second year.

tile_content: Multiple
content_details: Using highCharts and Illustrator, templates were created for quick use for day to day graphics.
content_tool: Highchart.js, CSS, HTML, Adobe Photoshop, Adobe Illustrator

project_name: Throw a last-minute royal wedding party
tile_content: Ways that Boston Globe’s readers can create a DIY Wedding Party for the Royal Wedding of Prince Harry and Meghan Markle
content_details: A digital story showcasing ways that Boston Globe’s readers can create a DIY Wedding Party for the Royal Wedding of Prince Harry and Meghan Markle.

project_name: When to pick apples in Massachusetts
tile_content: Map: showcases information for each organic orchards in the Boston area.
content_details: A map, created by Leaflet.js, where you can locate where to pick apples in Massachusetts. The map showcases the name, address, telephone number,web information of each organic orchards and bogs in Massachusetts, and the user can find their location and find the directions to their nearest orchards.

tile_content: Map: Showcasing the location of the hurricane and the category it was when it made rainfall.
content_details: A map, using Leaflet.js and QGIS, of a progress map of Hurricane Florence. I learned how to create a GeoJson via QGIS and to integrate it with the map to showcase the location of the hurricane and the category it will be when it makes landfall.

tile_content: Using data visualization and responsive design to showcase a review of Logan Airport.
content_details: I used responsive design and data visualization to showcase Logan Airport, which is considered one of the worst in the country for the third consecutive year. I created a bar chart and styled a graphic to showcase the quality of Logan Airport.

project_name: Trump Quotes from around the world
tile_content: President Trump quotes about different countries around the world.
content_details: I used responsive design and data visualization to showcase Logan Airport, which is considered one of the worst in the country for the third consecutive year. I created a bar chart and styled a graphic to showcase the quality of Logan Airport.

tile_content: Created a scarf using modular design, an approach that subdivides a system into smaller parts to create something new
content_details: When taking a fabrication course, I created an assignment about modular fashion. Modular design is a design approach that subdivides a system into smaller parts that can be created into something new. I developed a fabric choker through the smaller parts.
content_tool: Trotec Laser Cutter, Adobe Illustrator, Black and White Neoprene, Scissors

tile_content: Allow users to explore Open Chromatin Regions (promoters and enhancers) whose activity is associated with a specific gene
content_details: As the Full Stacked Developer, I integrated the SQL database with D3 to visualize Enhancer Networks to aid the researchers and scientist in the Immunological Genome Project. The Enhancer Networks databrowser allows users to explore the

tile_content: Using ml5 to create visualization through movement
content_details: My goal for this project is to create visualization through movement. The purpose is to develop a tool that uses ml5.js to track the body in order to create a visualization, in order to enhance choreography and teaching.

project_name: Black Employment in the United States
tile_content: Project focused on how race is affected by jobs and wages.
content_details: I created a zine (booklet) that built on W.E.B. Dubois Data Graphics, The Exhibit for American Negroes: Occupations of Negros and Whites in Georgia,  which showcase the occupation of Black and white people inthe 1900 Paris Exposition. I want to modernize it to showcase occupation and labor of Black people in the present.
content_tool: Adobe Illustrator, Art printer, and Paper

tile_content: Showcasing personal data focused on my hair
content_details: Inspired by Ellen Gallagher's Delux series, I created a zine to document my hair through time.  I am documenting my hair styles throughout the weeks of this project. Even subtly, I change my hair a lot due to various circumstances such as if I'm going to be outside for a long period of time, bike riding, or I want to protect myself from the elements. I felt that it will be good to document my hair once a day.
content_tool: Adobe Illustrator, Art printer, and Paper

project_name: How to put on fake nails?
tile_content: Create an informational page on how to put on nails using p5js and illustrations
content_details: In order to document process, my goal for this project is to highlight materials. I wanted to do a recreation of putting on press on nails, inspired by videos and a wiki-how about fake nails.
content_role: Interactive Designer, Artist, and Front-End Developer

tile_content: Create a collage mpa that showcases Northeastern's presence both on campus and surrounding neighborhoods.
content_details: Inspired by psychogeography, The map covers Northeastern campus and its surrounding area, where I decide to showcase buildings and landmarks. Using photos and illustrator, I wanted to show how Northeastern has expanded throughout the years to the surrounding neighborhoods and beyond.

tile_content: How flooding currently and will affect the infrastructure of Boston, Massachusetts
content_details: Inspired by the Boston Globe’s Flooding could shut down Logan airport, hospitals, and other critical infrastructure in Mass., and the risk is only growing,  it focused on how flooding will affect the infrastructure of Massachusetts. I wanted to take this concept and use it for the Boston Water Atlas, I want to identify flood hazards and how it could possibly affect communities, infrastrucutre, and neighborhoods in Boston.

tile_content: I used photography and icons to envision various streets without cars.
content_details: Inspired by Constant Nieuwenhuys, through sculptures, drawings, and writings developed the concept of New Babylon which is a futuristic city concept that focuses on an alternative to what he viewed as a more accessible city to explore. A psychogeography concept on alternate ways to navigate cities. I want to see how streets would be different without cars.

project_name: President Trump’s impeachment trial is underway. Here’s how we got here.
tile_content: Showcasing the people who are involved in Trump's impeachment.
content_details: The third presidential impeachment trial in the history of the United States began in earnest on Tuesday, with the Senate considering two articles of impeachment against President Donald J. Trump. I build a network that showcases the connections that led to Trump's impeachment.

project_name: Looking for a good book for summer? Try these recommendations.
tile_content: Books to read for Summer 2021.
content_details: For Summer 2021, I created a graphic using Svelte that showcases booksthat one can read during the summer. The book recommendations include images, the recommender, and why they recommended the book.

project_name: Your complete guide to Northeastern’s herb gardens
tile_content: Showcasing herb garden throughout Northeastern's campus.
content_details: Mapping herb gardens wehre  that students, staff, and faculty could cut herbs to build recipes throughout Northeastern's campus. When you scroll throughout the page, there will be a tik tok video showcasing recipes that could be used with the herbs.

project_name: Fresh Truck: A mobile market bringing healthy food to communities who need it the most
tile_content: Fresh Truck stops throughout Boston's communities.
content_details: Mapping Fresh Truck: A mobile market route throughout various communities in the Boston Area. It uses Mapbox and scrollmagic to showcases images and videos of Fresh truck on their route.

tile_content: Creating infographic showing Northeastern community at the 2022 Olympics by the numbers.
content_details: Here is an infographic that is shown  both digitally and physically that maps Northeastern by the numbers.

project_name: Do women publish less than men in scientific fields? Turns out, scientists have been asking the wrong question.
tile_content: Showcasing gender gap in the fields of science, technology, engineering, and math
content_details: I created a scrollytelling area chart that showcases the gaps between men and women within stem related feels; using text labels and to showcase the disparities between men and women.

tile_content: Showing how Northeastern and Boston colleges rank at the beanpot each year
content_details: I created a rank chart to represent Northeastern's ranking over time at men's and women's Boston Hockey tournament. I wanted to showcase and compare all the schools (Northeastern, Boston University, Harvard, and Boston College).

tile_content: Various stories using svelte templates
content_details: I built a svelte templates to be used in various stories to showcase and emphasize informatin.

project_name: Map: Best Places for a #NU2020 Selfie
tile_content: Map: Best photos to take for Commencement 2020
content_details: Here is a map where graduates can revisit their favorite areas of campus and get a special photo moment to honor their achievements. It is a map that was created with illustrator and Svelte templates to showcase where gradutes can take photos.

tile_content: Covid-19 dashboard to track vaccination throughout the Northeastern community.
content_details: I was given the task to redesign the COVID Dashboard for Northeastern to match the data given from our team at the testing site.
